snippet.title: Modern Zombie Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Download here: http://modernzombie.net/download
Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/modernzombieuk
Like us on facebook: http://facebook.com/modernzombieuk

Modern Zombie is a zombie survival game available to download on windows PC, where players endure the hardships of a post-apocalyptic, zombie-infested world. By collaborating with thousands of other players, and finding weapons and items, players increase their chances of survival. The game incorporates survival elements like hunger and thirst, which gradually grow over time. Supplies such as food and water can be found to battle the hunger and thirst. If the player fails to properly quench their hunger and thirst, the player’s character will eventually die thus, continuing the cycle of life and death in the game.
